task.name: ft
task.shortdescription: Insert a source model as a visibility set
task.description:
A source model (souce.model image) or components list is converted into model visibilities that is inserted into the MODEL_DATA column or alternatively is stored in the header of the MS to be served on the fly when requested.
Setjy will automatically make this ft step on the sources currently available, which are 3C48, 3C138, 3C147, 3C286 at 1.4, 5.0, 8.4, 15, 22, 43 GHz. Their location is site dependent. In Charlottesville and Socorro, the models are in /usr/lib(lib64)/casapy/data/nrao/VLA/CalModels.

param.name: vis
param.description:
Name of input visibility file Default: none
Example: vis='ngc5921.ms'

param.name: field
param.shortdescription: Select field using field id(s) or field name(s)
param.description:
Select field using field id(s) or field name(s) Default: '' (all fields)
BUT, only one source can be specified in a multi-source vis.
Examples: field = '1328+307' specifies source '1328+307' field = '4' specified field with index 4

param.name: spw
param.description: Select spectral window/channels Default: '' (all spectral windows and channels)

param.name: model
param.description:
Name of input model image(s) Default: '' (none)
Example: model='/usr/lib/casapy/data/nrao/VLA/CalModels/3C286_X.im'
NOTE: The model visibilities are scaled from the model frequency to the observed frequency of the data.

param.name: nterms
param.shortdescription: Number of terms used to model the sky frequency dependence
param.description:
Number of terms used to model the sky frequency dependence Default: 1 (one model image is required)
Example: nterms=3 - represents a 2nd order Taylor-polynomial in frequency and should be used in conjuction with coefficient model images as model=['xxx.model.tt0','xxx.model.tt1', 'xxx.model.tt2']

param.name: reffreq
param.description:
Reference-frequency about which this Taylor-expansion is defined. Default: '' (reads the reference frequency from the model image)
Example: reffreq = '1.5GHz'

param.name: complist
param.description:
Name of component list Default: none
Example: complist='test.cl'
WARNING: component lists are difficult to make

param.name: incremental
param.shortdescription: Add to the existing model visibility?
param.description: Add model visibility to the existing model visibilties stored in the MS Default: False Options: False|True

param.name: usescratch
param.shortdescription: If True, predicted visibility is stored in MODEL_DATA column
param.description:
Story visibilities in MODEL_DATA column? Default: False Options: False|True
If True, model visibilities will be stored in the scratch column MODEL_DATA; if False, the model visibilities will be generated on the fly (this mode may save some disk space equivalent to the volume of the observed data).
